hero.name: Kingsley Kanu
hero.title: Full-Stack JS/TS Developer
hero.headline: Shipping resilient web platforms with modern TypeScript tooling.
hero.description: Engineer specialising in TypeScript-first product delivery, platform modernisation, and API-centric experiences for startups and enterprise teams across Europe.

about.title: Collaborative engineering leadership
about.summary: Kingsley is a pragmatic full-stack engineer with a product mindset, leading cross-functional squads from discovery to deployment. With a strong grasp of DevOps automation and UX collaboration, Kingsley builds systems that stay maintainable long after launch.

highlights.label: Location
highlights.value: Berlin, Germany · Remote across EU & UK

skills.title: TypeScript-first delivery across the stack
skills.description: A toolkit tuned for rapid iteration, reliable releases, and strong developer experience across frontend and backend workflows.

systemOverview.title: Architecture tuned for Netlify delivery
systemOverview.summary: Kingsley packages iamkay.eu with a lean stack that pairs typed React components, automated deployments, and GitHub-powered data sources without paid infrastructure.

layers.name: Frontend
layers.summary: React 19, Vite, and TailwindCSS render an accessible single-page app with strict TypeScript coverage.

layers.name: Backend (optional)
layers.summary: Netlify Functions running on Node 18 can proxy GitHub requests when rate limits require server-side caching.

layers.name: Hosting & CI
layers.summary: The free Netlify tier delivers SSL, edge caching, and CI/CD builds triggered on every GitHub push.

layers.name: Data source
layers.summary: GitHub REST API surfaces the latest repositories while filtering forks and archived work.

layers.name: Domain
layers.summary: Custom domain iamkay.eu is mapped via CNAME to the Netlify deployment for branded delivery.

projects.title: Production experience & live repositories
projects.description: Live GitHub work pulls straight into this portfolio. Flagship case studies highlight how Kingsley scales delivery with modern TypeScript, cloud, and automation.

flagship.title: AuthApp
flagship.summary: Authentication demo delivering JWT sessions, OAuth handshakes, and role-based access control for SaaS teams.

flagship.title: SyncSkilled
flagship.summary: Skills exchange marketplace connecting mentors and learners with credit based incentives and scheduling automation.

flagship.title: Portfolio Core
flagship.summary: This portfolio system featuring dynamic GitHub insights, SEO metadata, and Netlify Forms automation.

flagship.title: InvoiceLink Mini
flagship.summary: E-invoicing prototype integrating with FIRS APIs to manage compliance-ready invoice submissions.

flagship.title: QuickLinker (AI Project Generator)
flagship.summary: Generates starter codebases from product ideas using OpenAI Codex prompts and scaffolding pipelines.

flagship.title: API Visualizer
flagship.summary: Interactive console for exploring REST endpoints, caching responses, and sharing API snapshots with teams.

flagship.title: Form Validator Pro
flagship.summary: Reusable validation toolkit for complex form workflows exporting JSON rule sets and accessible error states.

delivery.title: Quality guardrails and deployment workflow
delivery.summary: Operational expectations drawn from the Software Requirements Specification keep the portfolio fast, accessible, and reliable on the Netlify free tier.

quality.label: Performance
quality.description: Lighthouse ≥ 90 on desktop with optimised images and lightweight client bundles.

quality.label: Accessibility
quality.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with semantic structure, labelled controls, and focus-visible treatments.

quality.label: SEO
quality.description: Metadata includes titles, descriptions, Open Graph tags, and favicon assets for social previews.

quality.label: Security
quality.description: All traffic terminates over HTTPS via Netlify SSL with no frontend secrets stored in the bundle.

quality.label: Maintainability
quality.description: Component-based React architecture with strict TypeScript keeps updates predictable.

quality.label: Cost
quality.description: Runs entirely within Netlify’s free tier without external databases or paid services.

steps: Push to GitHub → Netlify build trigger.
Netlify installs dependencies and executes npm run build.
Build artefacts in /dist deploy to the global edge with automatic SSL.

environmentVariables.description: Configures the GitHub username used for the live repository feed.

futureEnhancements: Add Markdown/MDX blog for long-form engineering write-ups.
Ship dark mode persistence alongside analytics instrumentation (Plausible or Netlify Analytics).
Expose a "Hire Me" dashboard integrating a scheduling API.
Prototype AI-driven project scaffolding with OpenAI Codex or LangChain demos.

contact.title: Ready to collaborate on your next release?
contact.summary: Drop a message with your goals, timeline, and tech stack. You will hear back within two business days with a kickoff slot or clarifying questions.

footer.summary: Built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. Deployed to the Netlify free tier.
